changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE users( user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, full_name VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL, eamil VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL UNIQUE, phone VARCHAR(20) UNIQUE, password_hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, country VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, language VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL , dob DATE DEFAULT NOW(), created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(), updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW() );
